name: To The Unknown
description:
This game is made for GMTK Jam 2020 for the theme "OUT OF CONTROL".

I am very proud with the result and i hope that you'll like it.

-Press A to move left

-Press D to move right

-Press W to jump

-Press L to dash

-Press J to attack

NOTE : The Controls will not be the same after you pass two levels.
